divs: Sighting Detailsme my little sis and her frend were out side in our yard looking at the stars and i sow one that was witeish blue and looked like it was moving so the first thing that i thought was that it was aircraft from the airport but the more that we watched the more we realised that it was no way it could be from the airport or human it moved in a circlular moshen slowely we got scaird and ran inside and got my dad to come and look and he saw the same thing so we watched it for about 30 mins and after a wile we got tired and went to bed but i have never seen somthing like it in my life i am certan that this is a u.f.o.
